fields.subject: Smoking and Health Conference in Philadelphia
fields.title: April 28, 1966 - Smoking and Health Conference to Take Place In Philadelphia This Week.
fields.author: Wade B Palterson
fields.content:
Aprtl
1966
Smoking,
throush health conference
the Cancer Board of the Oregon Inter-Agency Special Presentations on Tobacco Control in Northeast Philadelphia. The state has already achieved remarkable successes against smoking and lung cancer, but there is still much to be done.
More than 100 seventh and eighth graders from Central Oregon attended a program at Prineville High School last Saturday as part of the survey conducted by researcher Dr. Roger Stark on physical disorders among children caused by smoking parents.
